feed.title: Apache Teaclave (incubating)
feed.subtitle: Apache Teaclave (incubating) is an open source universal secure computing platform, making computation on privacy-sensitive data safe and simple.

entry.title: Mitigation of Intel-SA-00219 in Teaclave SGX SDK
entry.summary: Intel issued Intel SA-00219 on Nov 12, 2019, with CVE number CVE-2019-0117. Intel also published a guidance to instruct the developers/researchers. Then Intel released Intel SGX SDK v2.7.1, including new memory allocation primitives and corresponding patches in PSW enclaves.

entry.title: Podling Teaclave Report - July 2020
entry.summary: are using either the Teaclave platform and Teaclave's Rust SGX SDK.

entry.title: Podling Teaclave Report - October 2020
entry.summary: The main goal of development since the last report is to resolve logistics towards the first Apache release. This includes license checking, building system improvement, documentation and write-ups. On Oct 9th, the Teaclave community and incubator has passed 0.1.0 release voting.

entry.title: Podling Teaclave Report - January 2020
entry.summary: [ ] Initial setup [x] Working towards first release [ ] Community building [ ] Nearing graduation [ ] Other:

entry.title: Podling Teaclave Report - April 2020
entry.summary: service. Communication protocols between services are defined in protobuf. RPC between services has been redesigned to supported TLS-based attestation. We have added DCAP attestation algorithm in the platform so that people can deploy the system in environments without Intel's attestation service. Communication between app and enclave has been also redesigned with better APIs. All updates is currently in the develop branch. We plan to merge into master when main refactoring is done.

entry.title: 让安全计算更简单 - Apache Teaclave (incubating) 0.1.0 正式发布
entry.summary: Teaclave 平台和 Teaclave SGX SDK。这些都给项目的发展提供源源不断的动力。

entry.title: The Teaclave Secure Computing Ecosystem - Projects Powered by Teaclave
entry.summary: users. In a border view, the Teaclave community aims to support commercial products, academic research projects, teaching platform, and other open source projects powered by Teaclave.

entry.title: Teaclave 安全计算开源生态 - 由 Teaclave 驱动的开源项目一览
entry.summary: 以上些项目都是利用 TEE 提供的硬件隔离、内存加密、远程证实等特性，保护业务中数据计算的隐私。一些项目在 SGX SDK 基础上提供了更为便利的可信执行环境框架，比如 Occlum 和 Veracruz。另外一些项目使用 SGX SDK 编写 TEE 应用保护其业务逻辑中的数据隐私，或提供可信的节点，如 Secret Network 和 substraTEE。还有一些项目移植使用 Teaclave 平台里的通用模块，比如远程证实代码库等等。更多关于由 Teaclave 驱动的开源项目列表可以在官网中查看（https://teaclave.apache.org/community/）。

entry.title: Roadmap in 2021: Project Maturity and Community Buildup
entry.summary: Last year, we published an RFC - "Roadmap: Towards the First Public Release". Thanks for the continuous efforts made by the community. We have completed several milestones and amazing achievements.

entry.title: Announcing Apache Teaclave (incubating) 0.2.0
entry.summary: Teaclave 0.2.0 can be downloaded at the download page. Note that it is essential to verify the integrity of the downloaded file using the PGP signature (the .asc file) or a hash (the .sha256 file).

entry.title: 欢迎 Rust OP-TEE TrustZone SDK 成为 Teaclave 子项目
entry.summary: 。更多关于 Teaclave TrustZone SDK 的设计和性能等都在论文 RusTEE: Developing Memory-Safe ARM TrustZone Applications 中找到，此论文也收录于 ACSAC 2020。

entry.title: Welcome Rust OP-TEE TrustZone SDK to Teaclave
entry.summary: By using the rich type system of Rust, the memory safety issues will be reported at compile time. For example, in the following case, compared to C's APIs, the Rust APIs have clearer semantics and more strict type checking.

entry.title: Teaclave Meetup #3
entry.summary: including Azure Open Enclave, Nitro Enclave, Google confidential computing VM and Fortanix. From the perspective of customers, we also focus on the attestation reports the customers can get. We then introduce Teaclave's current attestation design and discuss the attestation report standard Teaclave should follow.
